```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(stringr)
library(purrr)
library(magrittr)
```

```{r long_data_load_tidy}
long_data = str_c("./data/", list.files(path = "./data")) 
read_long = function(x) {
  read_csv(x)
}

output = map_dfr(long_data, read_long) %>% 
  mutate(cont_arm = str_sub(long_data, 8, 10),
         cont_arm = replace(cont_arm, cont_arm == "con", "control"),
         cont_arm = replace(cont_arm, cont_arm == "exp", "experimental")) %>% 
  mutate(cont_no = str_sub(long_data, 12, 13)) %>% 
  select(cont_arm, cont_no, everything()) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()
```
